Completed development properties

Included in completed deveiopment properties is an allowance of RM2,088,000 (2016: Nil) to write down the carrying value of the completed development properties to net reatisable value. Also included in the balance as at 30 June 2017 is an amount of RM10,971,000 (2016: Nil) that relates to funding received by the Group from the local governments assistance scheme for the development costs incurred for Hatten City Phase 1.

Development properties under construction (a) Unsold units

The amount relates to costs attributabie to the unsold units. Borrowing costs capitalised as cost of development properties under construction for unsoid units ranged from 6.81 /0 to 8.35% (2016: 6.85% to 835%) per annum,

The Group assesses at each reporting date whether any allowance for foreseeable losses is required. The allowance for foreseeable losses is estimated after taking into account estimated selling prices and estimated total construction costs, The estimated selling prices are based on recent selling prices tor the development project or comparable projects and prevaiiing market conditions. The estimated total construction costs are based on contracted amounts and, in respect of amounts not contracted tor, management's estimates of the amounts to be incurred taking into consideration historical trends of the amounts incurred, As at the reporting date, no allowance for foreseeable losses is recorded. Allowance for foreseeable losses of RM2,088,000 provided during the financial year ended 30 June 2016 was transferred to completed development properties upon compietion of the deveiopmeht project during the year.
